ISSUE.TITLE: Customer cached by CustomerGuid is not removed from cache when it should be
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40.3 Steps to reproduce the problem: When a customer is modified, the customer entity instance that is cached using CustomerGuid is not removed unless the SystemName property is set. This is not correct. It should always be removed.
